danceRejection: No thanks, @. I'm not much of a dancer.$2
divorced: Please leave me alone, @.$5#$e#I said, please leave me alone. If you keep bothering me, I'll be a lot less friendly in my language.$5
secondChance_Girls: ...$2#$b#I... I guess I'll talk to you again, @...#$b#Only because I missed you so much.#$b#But you're on a thin line, @. Mess up again, and it's over.$5
Mon: Exercise is my life. I can't imagine a life without it.$3
Tue: I bike here every day from my shared apartment in Zuzu City.#$b#The fresh air here is much better for training!$1
Thu: You ever eat Kale fresh off the stalk? It's life-changing!
Fri: I can't stay here long on Fridays, I have a yoga class in town.
Sat: My roommates usually party today.#$b#I'm not a big fan of it, so I'm staying here until later.
Sun: Even on weekends, the grind doesn't stop!$1
summer_Mon: Summers here get really warm!#$b#I get a sweat going quicker!$1
summer_Tue: I forgot to bring my sunscreen today! Tomorrow's gonna be a bit painful.
summer_Thu: What's your favorite fruit, @?#$b#I really like blueberries.
summer_Fri: It's a pretty far bike ride from Zuzu City, but it helps build up my leg muscles!$1
summer_Sat: Geez louise, the heat's really gettin' to me today!
summer_Sun: Sundays can be a little tough for me...$2#$b#...but I have to keep pushin'.$3
fall_Mon: The fall's a sad time for me... but I can't let it get to me.
fall_Tue: The crisp air, the colorful leaves, I love the autumn aesthetic!$1#$b#...I just can't enjoy it as much as I used to.$2
fall_Wed: Hey @.$3#$b#Focusing on my exercise today. Sorry.$2
fall_Fri: I hate beer. My roommates have been trying to get me to drink, but I'm not that big on that lifestyle.
fall_Sun: Today's a terrible day, @.$2#$b#I can't talk today. Sorry.$9
Wed: Gus makes a really good salad here!#$b#Sometimes I just don't wanna leave, it's great for my diet!$1
Introduction: Hey, I'm Delores!#$b#I'm sort of an outsider here, so nobody really talks to me...$2#$b#But it's so nice to meet you!!$1
winter_Mon: Winter's here! I absolutely love the cold.#$b#Exercise just warms you right up, it's great!$1
winter_Tue: Everyone loves the Feast of the Winter Star, but it's always a bit of a rough holiday for me.$2#$b#Not to mention, my roommates always leave me out of their Secret Santa.$2
winter_Thu: Hey @, what are you doing now that you can't grow anything?
winter_Fri: Yoga class tonight was cancelled!$1#$b#Might have to order some falafel tonight!
winter_Sat: Do I say 'the grind doesn't stop' too much? I love that phrase, but if it gets annoying, let me know.
winter_Sun: Even though I love winter, I can't not say that I'm not excited for spring!
Mon2: I don't know what it is about Cindersap Forest that draws me to it...#$e#Maybe it's the fresh air, or maybe it's the prettiness!$1
Tue2: A car almost clipped me as I was riding here today!$5#$e#Sorry if I'm a bit short today, it kind of ruined my mood.$2
winter_Wed: It's so hard to bike ride through the snow!$3#$b#It's a great exercise!$1
Wed2: I follow a close vegan diet.#$e#It's partly about the animals, but it's also partly because it makes me feel great!$1
Thu2: Hey @, about that time in the forest...$3#$e#...Nevermind, sorry!$2
Fri2: I've been thinking of learning another language! I'm thinking either Mandarin or Japanese.
Sat2: People say I should get some 'girly' hobbies...#$b#...but who's to say that exercising isn't girly?#$e#Please never say something like that, @.^Do you ever get asked that, @?
Sun2: I feel like I don't fit into any of the groups around town.$2#$e#I considered asking Caroline if I could go to her aerobics exercise classes, but they probably wouldn't want me.$3
summer_Mon2: The city somehow simultaneously seems warmer than here, and yet also cooler.#$e#I guess I can't really bring the air from here over to there, right?$1
summer_Tue2: My roommate stole one of my pillows the other day, so now I only have 2 of them.#$e#I sound really annoying, but I really want that pillow back.$2
summer_Wed2: Might have to get thinner blankets back home! It's been SCORCHING!!$1
summer_Thu2: A random guy walked up to me while I was drinking water on the ride here today and told me to smile more.$3#$b#$q 100010/100011 frownfallback#Do I... frown too much?$2#$r 100010 0 frownisokay#No, it's okay to frown!#$r 100011 0 frownisbad#You do, you should definitely smile more.
frownisokay: I think you're right, @... I shouldn't hide how I'm feeling.
frownfallback: $p 10010#Thanks @, I'll keep being myself.$1|Thanks @, I'll keep that in mind.$1
summer_Fri2: I might have to call an early one tonight, this weather is kicking my butt!#$e#But, I shouldn't give up!
summer_Sat2: Sometimes when I think the heat gets to me too much, I think about how lucky I am that I'm not exercising in the desert.#$b#Then again, that sounds pretty fun.$1
summer_Sun2: How long until fall comes?#$e#Fall is the worst!$2
fall_Tue2: Oh, hey, @.$2#$e#Not much to say today.$2
fall_Wed2: Today's actually a good day for once!#$e#How's your day going, @?
fall_Thu2: Have you ever had a blueberry smoothie?#$e#They're pretty good.#$b#My dad used to make them for me.$2
fall_Fri2: When I was a kid, I loved to dress up for Spirit's Eve. Maybe I can try dressing up again this year.
winter_Mon2: What's the coldest temperature you've ever been outside in?#$b#Whoa, that's cold!$1
winter_Tue2: Might make myself a nice Fried Mushroom tonight and bundle up under the covers!#$e#Maybe I'll rent a movie too, that's always fun!$1
winter_Wed2: It's a bad brain day today, @. Time to exercise it away!
winter_Thu2: Man, sometimes I forget how quick time is moving. It's already winter!$1
winter_Fri2: My bike's tire is getting squeaky! Might have to take it in for repairs...
winter_Sat2: I wish I could play the guitar...#$e#It's really cool that Sam can play it, but I'm older than him and I can't? What does that say about me?$2#$e#Maybe I'm just spreading myself too thin, I already focus on exercise.
winter_Sun2: What's the wind chill like today??#$e#It's chilling me down to the bone!!$1
Mon4: I've been thinking lately, maybe I should move out here to Stardew.#$e#I don't think there are any houses on the market though.$2
Tue4: Need me a refreshing Red Plate today! That sounds really appetizing.$1
Wed4: Sorry for being so pessimistic sometimes. It gets really tough.$2
Thu4: My roommates are some people I know from high school.#$e#I sometimes feel like I'm the only one who's grown up since then.
Fri4: I picked up a new vinyl record earlier today!#$b#I'm excited to give it a spin!$1#$e#I just hope my roommates don't mess around with it like they always do.$2
Sun4: I need to stop in at Pierre's one of these days. I always seem to forget.
summer_Mon4: My favorite sandwich shop in town closed down today.$3#$e#Might have to start coming to Gus's exclusively now.
summer_Tue4: What's your favorite band, @?#$b#Or do you not listen to much music?
summer_Wed4: When it gets hot, I gotta bring the heat!$1
summer_Thu4: I'm not too into alcohol, but mead isn't the worst to drink. Beer is just disgusting, though.
summer_Fri4: When it gets warm like this, I like to freeze blueberries and just eat 'em like some frozen treat!$1
summer_Sun4: The fall's really hard for me, if you haven't noticed.$2#$e#I know I shouldn't hide my sadness, but, blagh.$3
fall_Mon4: Hey, @. Going to call an early one today, I think.$3
fall_Tue4: Hospitals are awful. The sterile smell just brings me right back to the past...$2
fall_Wed4: Today's actually a good day for once!#$e#How's your day going, @?$1
fall_Fri4: Do you think I overwork myself, @?#$e#I think I achieve the happy medium between overwork and underwork.
fall_Sat4: Saturdays in fall are always ruined because I'm always expecting them to be tough...$2
fall_Sun4: Hey @.$2#$e#Thanks for being nice to me all the time.$9
winter_Mon4: Waking up in the winter can be hard, but it's essential!
winter_Wed4: When it gets this cold, I like to make myself a nice mug of green tea and relax.#$e#I'm not even a fan of green tea, either! It's just relaxing!$1
winter_Thu4: Have you played that arcade game, Legend of the Prairie King, in the saloon?#$e#I want to play the other one, but I'm not sure how it would work.
winter_Fri4: What's your favorite band, @?#$b#Or do you not listen to much music?
summer_Sat4: My bike's tire is getting squeaky! Might have to take it in for repairs...#$e#Unless you know how to repair bikes...$7
winter_Sat4: It's a cold one today! It's almost stopping me from exercising!#$e#Almost!$7
winter_Sun4: Must keep pushin'. If we take a break every time we're not okay, then who's gonna be pushin'?
winter_Tue4: Hey, they gave me the wrong thing when I ordered this morning, I don't eat fish.#$b#Here you go! [212 209 225 732]
Mon6: Thank you for being such a good friend, @.$1#$b#I know I can be a bit of a handful sometimes.
Tue6: Emily seems like a nice girl, honestly.#$e#Do you think her and I could become friends?
Wed6: It feels nice to actually not be hiding things from you.#$b#I know I was real secretive about my whole dad thing, but I didn't want to scare you away with my trauma.$2
Thu6: Maybe when I attempt this world record thing I could raise some money for cancer research.#$e#That'd be pretty cool, right?$1
Fri6: I think my roommate is pregnant!#$e#I hope she knows the father...$2
Sat6: I found a new sandwich shop! It uses organic ingredients, so I feel at home there.$1
Sun6: My dad used to play me vinyl records every Friday before he'd bring me to school.#$e#I miss those days.$2
Sat4: Hey there, @! Take this! [349 351]$1#$e#It's always great to be energized!$1
summer_Mon6: Hey there, @! Take this! [349 351]$1#$e#It's always great to be energized!$1
summer_Tue6: You're really cool, @. Thank you for putting up with me.$1
summer_Wed6: I can stay here in Stardew all day! The heat is just right.$1
summer_Thu6: Thank Yoba for energy drinks!$1#$e#They keep me going when it gets REALLY warm!!
summer_Fri6: Is it weird if I say 'thank Yoba' despite not being particularly religious?#$e#It just seems oddly superficial to me...
summer_Sat6: I could potentially be the fastest runner here in Stardew Valley! What do you think?$7
summer_Sun6: You know, maybe this fall will be different.
fall_Mon6: How do you deal with bad brain days, @?$3#$e#Do you just work it away on the farm?$3
fall_Tue6: It's one of those days, @.$2#$e#Can we hang out a bit?$3
fall_Wed6: Today was okay. My favorite sandwich shop gave me a free side salad.
fall_Thu6: Ugh, my roommates are awful.$2#$e#I hope I can stay here as long as possible today.$3
fall_Sun6: Thanks for being here for me today, @.$9
winter_Mon6: Winter's here, and now I'm cheery!$1#$e#You getting me anything for Feast of the Winter Star?$7#$e#Just kidding! You don't need to get me anything.$1
winter_Tue6: Sometimes, when I have trouble exercising, I just envision myself as a rocket ship.#$e#Those days, I just say to myself, 'Blast off!', and I get going!#$b#...is that childish?$2
winter_Wed6: My roommates are going to a party tonight.#$e#Guess who's going to watch movies while eating some blueberries?$1
winter_Thu6: Hey there, @! Take this! [349 351]$1#e#It's always great to be energized!$1

winter_Fri6: Is it weird if I say 'thank Yoba' despite not being particularly religious?#$e#It just seems oddly superficial to me...
winter_Sun6: The changing of years is always pretty beautiful. Another year in the books, and another one to prepare for!$1#$e#What's next on life's roller coaster?$1
winter_Sat6: I could potentially be the fastest runner here in Stardew Valley! What do you think?$7
Mon8: Don't tell Harvey, but I'm doing some light exercise, I can't just not, you know?$2#$e#Is... is it bad if I do this? I mean, I'm not hurting anyone...$2
Tue8: Do you have any fluffy animals on your farm?#$b#Can I meet them some time?$1
Wed8: Hey, @... I... really like your shirt today.$4
Thu8: Bit tired today, might have to sleep early tonight.#$b#If my roommates aren't too loud, that is.$3
Fri8: My granny would always tell me that the universe will catch me if I fall...$2#$e#I think that's true, if recent times are any indication of that.$4
Sun8: I'd love to go to more concerts, but it's tough to work those into my exercising schedule, you know?#$e#Maybe we should go to a concert together one of these days.$4
summer_Mon8: Must get warm working on that farm in this heat!#$e#Make sure to drink plenty of water, okay? I'd hate to see you hurt.$2
summer_Tue8: I really dislike the city. I hope I can get out of there soon.#$e#Who knows, maybe I can end up living here?$7
Sat8: For some reason, I always wanted to become a pro wrestler when I was a kid.#$e#I grew out of that, but could you imagine me in spandex?$7
summer_Wed8: Maybe the secret to being strong isn't in my muscles, but more in how you deal with it in your head.#$e#Not that I'm particularly good at lifting things!$1
summer_Thu8: I could go for some fresh blueberries right now!#$e#You growing any on your farm?$1#$e#I might sneak on your farm and take some!$7
summer_Fri8: Need a pick me up? Here you go![349]#$e#Always good to be energized!$7
summer_Sat8: Ugh! One of my idiot roommates microwaved a fish last night, so I had to sleep with a terrible fishy smell all night.$5
summer_Sun8: Fun fact about me! I'm not a very strong swimmer.#$e#Do you have any lesser known fun facts about yourself? I bet you have lots!$4#$b#...#$b#Hah, that's awesome! I love that.$8
fall_Mon8: I think this fall will be better than the last few for a few reasons.$4
fall_Tue8: Do you have to rake on your farm?#$e#When I was a kid, we'd always rake these huge leaf piles and then my dad would throw me in it, it was the best.$1#$b#If you have a huge leaf pile, you should let me jump in it a couple of times.$7
fall_Wed8: The forest is really nice to exercise in, in the fall! The crunchyness of the orange leaves, and the smells, man!$1
fall_Thu8: I used to be on the track team back in high school, but I had to drop out of it my senior year.#$e#It was a fun experience, it kind of helped me get to where I am today!
fall_Fri8: I visited my dad's grave again yesterday. I laid some summer spangle down, like he loved when he was alive.#$e#I think he appreciated it.$1#$e#I miss him.$2
fall_Sat8: Emily actually said hi to me the other day!$1#$e#Her sister didn't, but one person acknowledging me is something, right?!
fall_Sun8: I think I can manage the falls this time.#$e#Thank you for sticking with me through it.$8
winter_Mon8: This cold is really getting to me! It feels like I'm being held together by tape.$2
winter_Tue8: Ugh! One of my idiot roommates microwaved a fish last night, so I had to sleep with a terrible fishy smell all night.$5
winter_Wed8: I sort of want to get a nose ring, but I don't know if it'd fit my nose well.#$e#It's sort of an impulsive thing anyways, I'll be over it soon.
winter_Thu8: Need a pick me up? Here you go![349]#$e#Always good to be energized!$7
winter_Fri8: I want to build a huge snowman this winter!$1#$e#The biggest one I've ever built was about 2 feet taller than me. I want to reach my former glory.$7
winter_Sat8: Before I found this place, I would always walk down to a park in ZuZu City to exercise.#$e#That place would always close before I was done. Here though? It's all day!$1
winter_Sun8: I really dislike the city. I hope I can get out of there soon.#$e#Who knows, maybe I can end up living here?$7
Mon10: Ooh, what's cooking, good looking?$7#$e#Sorry, I've always wanted to say that to someone.$4
Tue10: I really dislike the city. I hope I can get out of there soon.#$e#Who knows, maybe I can end up living here? Do you know of any places I could live?$7

Thu10: I think we were meant for each other, what do you think?$4
Fri10: Hey, @! Close your eyes for a second.$4#$b#%*smooch*#$b#Gotcha.$7
Sat10: Do you decorate your house?$1#$e#I bet you've got awesome taste!$8#$b#Especially since you're dating me.$7
Sun10: Thank you for sticking with me for this long, @. You're a true friend!$4#$e#You're a hot friend, too, did you know that?$7
summer_Mon10: Man, it's hot this summer.#$e#Or maybe it's just because you're around.$8
summer_Wed10: My roommates have been bugging me about you, they know something's up because I'm smiling all the time.$8#$e#I can't wait to be out of there... maybe you know a place I could stay instead?$7
summer_Thu10: Man, remember the time in the hospital?#$e#We should do that again soon...$7
summer_Fri10: I've been pondering sending my mom a letter recently.#$e#But I also think that the past can stay in the past at this point. I have a really bright future ahead of me.
summer_Tue10: You know, sometimes I see Jas and Vincent playing out in the forest, and it seems...$4#$e#What do you think, @?
summer_Sat10: Geez, it's so warm today!#$b#My sports bra is gonna be hell to get off later.$4#$e#...what's with that look? I have to get it washed daily!$8
summer_Sun10: It's already %time?!#$e#I guess time flies when you're around.$8
fall_Mon10: You know, the pain never truly goes away...$2#$e#But you being around helps dull it quite a bit. <$8
fall_Wed10: I don't care for material things, I just want love. You know what I mean?$4
fall_Tue10: I wish I could bring you with me to my apartment, but there is not enough room for both of us on my bed.$2#$b#...why are you smirking like that?$4
fall_Thu10: I visited my dad's grave again today. I miss him, @.$2#$b#I'm glad you're here.$4
fall_Fri10: Emily and I had a long discussion at the saloon yesterday!#$b#Things are good!#$e#Especially because I have the hottest boyfriend ever!$8^Especially because I have the hottest girlfriend ever!$8
fall_Sat10: I never dated much at school. Nobody caught my attention.$4#$b#When I first saw you, though, I knew something was different.
fall_Sun10: I'm having a bad day, @.$2#$e#Can I get a hug, please?$2#$b#%*hug*#$b#I can't believe how good you are hugs, not to mention... other... things...$4#$b#Thank you.$7

winter_Fri10: Ugh, the heater in my apartment broke.$5#$b#What perfect timing, what with it being winter and all...$5
winter_Sat10: A lot of people don't know this, but I absolutely love operas.#$e#The way they sing is just unmatched!$1
winter_Sun10: Hey, @... I... really like your shirt today.$4#$e#...I think you'd look better without it though.$8
